name: Tony Tony Chopper
text: End of Your Turn: Return 1 or more DON!! to your DON!! deck. Set this character as active. Then, this character gains Blocker until the end of your opponent's next turn.

effect.text: Return 1 or more DON!! to your DON!! deck. Set this character as active. Then, this character gains Blocker until the end of your opponent's next turn.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' in image, but ID and other fields are based on printed text.
